name: Questions for Friends
description:
A small experimental game about self and friend-group exploration. 
Use this to better understand your friends, to get an amazing playlist, a fun little meme collection, or to collectively tackle some more serious questions.

Players will answer questions by placing files in the corresponding folders.  These files can range from the obvious text documents to links, images, audio or video.

The catalogue of questions and responses will organically grow, based on the questions and answers provided by the previous players, ensuring every game is going to be unique and full of fun little insiders.

It would be cool, if you could post a screenshot of your finished game in the comments section, or tweet it at me @funnybrutalism.

Thank's for playing, let me know what you think.
